definition: parent/one's own (flesh and blood)/relative/related/marriage/bride/close/intimate/in person/first-hand/in favor of/pro-/to kiss/(Internet slang) dear

sentences.english: And when the king was come over, the king kissed Barzillai, and blessed him; and he returned unto his own place.
sentences.chinese: 王与巴西莱亲嘴，为他祝福，巴西莱就回本地去了。

sentences.english: And hast not suffered me to kiss my sons and my daughters?
sentences.chinese: 又不容我与外孙和女儿亲嘴。

sentences.english: The pair, who are a couple in real life, also took home the Best Kiss award.
sentences.chinese: 这对于现实糊口情侣还捧走了最佳亲嘴奖。

sentences.english: Greet ye one another with a kiss of charity.
sentences.chinese: 你们要用爱心彼此亲嘴问安。

sentences.english: And Joab took Amasa by the beard with the right hand to kiss him.
sentences.chinese: 就用右手抓住亚玛撒的胡子，要与他亲嘴。

sentences.english: Wounds from a friend can be trusted, but an enemy multiplies kisses.
sentences.chinese: 朋友加的伤痕，出于忠诚，仇敌连连亲嘴，却是多馀。

sentences.english: And his father Isaac said unto him, Come near now, and kiss me, my son.
sentences.chinese: 他父亲以撒对他说，我儿，你上前来与我亲嘴。

sentences.english: when I should find thee without, I would kiss thee; yea, I should not be despised.
sentences.chinese: 我在外头遇见你就与你亲嘴，谁也不轻看我。

sentences.english: Cor. 13:12 Greet one another with a holy kiss.
sentences.chinese: 林后十三12你们要用圣别的亲嘴彼此问安。

sentences.english: Salute one another with an holy kiss.
sentences.chinese: 你们亲嘴问安，彼此务要圣洁。

sentences.english: They broke the news director in the studio too intimate, non-stop kissing people can not stand.
sentences.chinese: 导演爆料两人在片场太过亲昵，不停亲嘴让人受不了。

sentences.english: But Jesus said unto him, Judas, betrayest thou the Son of man with a kiss?
sentences.chinese: 耶稣对他说，犹大，你用亲嘴的暗号卖人子吗。

sentences.english: Smooch A young man smooches with a girl in the car.
sentences.chinese: 一个年轻人在汽车里搂着一个姑娘亲嘴。

sentences.english: I cannot rest until he kisses me with the kiss of his mouth.
sentences.chinese: 我无法平静直到他用口与我亲嘴。

sentences.english: Every man shall kiss his lips that giveth a right answer.
sentences.chinese: 应对正直的，犹如与人亲嘴。

sentences.english: And Joseph fell upon his father's face， and wept upon him， and kissed him.
sentences.chinese: 约瑟伏在他父亲的面上哀哭，与他亲嘴。

definition: to come to blows/to paw/to grope/to get fresh
to tease a woman by pretending to be displeased with her/to flirt with a member of the opposite sex/to banter flirtatiously
